lines: You will go no further. The reason should be plain─beyond lies the prison of Koryu. Were you to damage the wards, he would break free, and all would fall to ruin.
So it has come to this...
You may think it a dull, thankless task to stand watch over the sacred crystal for several thousand years. Frankly...you would not be entirely wrong to say so. Nevertheless, it is our duty.

obj.n: Tout juste pareil au songe d'une nuit de printemps
